sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { X, Calendar, MapPin, Users, Info, ArrowLeft } from 'lucide-react'; const EventDetails = ({ event, onClose, onRegister, theme }) => { const isDark = theme === 'dark'; const styles = { overlay: { position: 'fixed', top: 0, left: 0, right: 0, bottom: 0, backgroundColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.5)', zIndex: 1000, display: 'flex', alignItems: 'flex-end' }, panel: { width: '100%', maxWidth: '430px', margin: '0 auto', backgroundColor: isDark ? '#1e293b' : '#fff', borderTopLeftRadius: '28px', borderTopRightRadius: '28px', padding: '20px', maxHeight: '90vh', overflowY: 'auto', position: 'relative', animation: 'slideUp 0.3s ease-out' }, image: { width: '100%', height: '200px', objectFit: 'cover', borderRadius: '20px', marginBottom: '20px' }, badge: { backgroundColor: '#5c5cfc', color: '#fff', padding: '4px 12px', borderRadius: '8px', fontSize: '12px', fontWeight: 'bold', display: 'inline-block', marginBottom: '10px', textTransform: 'uppercase' }, infoRow: { display: 'flex', gap: '12px', marginBottom: '16px' }, btnRegister: { width: '100%', backgroundColor: '#5c5cfc', color: '#fff', border: 'none', padding: '16px', borderRadius: '16px', fontWeight: 'bold', fontSize: '16px', marginTop: '20px', cursor: 'pointer' }, btnBack: { width: '100%', backgroundColor: 'transparent', color: isDark ? '#fff' : '#1e293b', border: isDark ? '1px solid #334155' : '1px solid #e2e8f0', padding: '14px', borderRadius: '16px', fontWeight: 'bold', marginTop: '10px', cursor: 'pointer' } }; return (
e.stopPropagation()}> {event.category || 'Technology'}

{event.title}

{event.date.split('·')[0]}
10:00 AM - 4:00 PM
{event.location}
Central Campus
45 Seats Left
Hurry up, filling fast!

About Event

Join us for the biggest student tech summit of the year. Explore the latest in AI, Blockchain, and Cloud Computing with industry experts. Lunch and certificates provided for all attendees.

); }; export default EventDetails;
